constituent: apprehensive, rice field, brains, hairpin, safety-pin
koohiiStory1: The girl was apprehensive about going home, having lost her precious hairpin in the paddy field. But then, it wasn't like she'd lost both, just ONE...
koohiiStory2: I ran out of Q-tips...then I noticed a hairpin lying on the counter that was about the same size as a Q-tip. I was apprehensive at first, but I thought "what the hell". Unfortunately I ended up stabbing my brain!
kunYomi: おそ.れる、かしこ.まる、かしこ、かしこ.し
words: 畏まりました(かしこまりました): certainly!
